GapFillDragDrop.Title: Time phrases with the Present perfect and Past simple
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the phrases to the correct spaces.

Content.Question:
1. Has your aunt left? No, she hasn’t.
2. Did Mr Thomson catch his plane yesterday? Yes, he did.
3. Has your new computer arrived? Yes, it has.
4. Have your parents ever been to Turkey? No, they haven’t.
5. Did we stay in the Plaza Hotel last time we went? Yes, we did.
6. Did I meet you last year? No, you didn’t.
7. Have you seen Anna recently? No, I haven’t.
8. Did Nick and Vicky speak to you last night? No, they didn’t.
9. Have we met before? Yes, we have.
10. Did you post Raoul’s birthday card yesterday? Yes, I did.
11. Has your uncle phoned today? Yes, he has.
12. Did your cat come home last night? No, it didn’t.
